message: JDO-780: Potential NullPointerException in code (patch proviede by Xiangzhe Xu)
JDO-303 NPE if no tests were run.
JDO-545 Comment out line that causes NPE putting a null value into a Hashtable.

JDO-640: NPE when running tck in debug mode
Fixed debug statement in the company factory methods. 
Now the all fields are initialized before the instance is printed. 
Changed print code to check or date fields being null.

Added new assertions
A12.6-3 [Null arguments to APIs that take an Object parameter cause the API to have no effect.] A12.6-4 [Null arguments to APIs that take Object[] or Collection will cause the API to throw NullPointerException.] A12.6-5 [Non-null Object[] or Collection arguments that contain null elements will have the documented behavior for non-null elements, and the null elements will be ignored.] 

A14.6.9-9 [If an SCO field is in the result, the projected field is  not owned by any persistent instance, and modifying the SCO value has  no effect on any persistent instance. If an FCO field is in the  result, the projected field is a persistent instance, and  modifications made to the instance are are reflected as changes to  the datastore per transaction requirements.]
